Title: Wasabi
Actors: Jean Reno, Ryôko Hirosue, Michel Muller, Carole Bouquet
Plot: In Japan for the funeral of his long-lost love, a tough French detective learns that he also has a teenage daughter and that her life is in danger from the Yakuza.
Production: Destiny [jp], Samitose Productions [fr], TF1 Films Productions, Canal+, EuropaCorp, Victor Company of Japan Ltd. (JVC) [jp]
